description: ORDER, REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION:    ORDERED that the clerk of the court is respectfully directed to modify the court's records to change defendant Corey Connlley's name on the docket to "Corey Conley".   RECOMMENDED that defendan ts' motion for summary judgment (Dkt. No.  79 ) GRANTED, in part, and DENIED, in part, and that all claims in plaintiff's complaint except the following, which will remain for trial, be DISMISSED: (1) a First Amendment free speech and expre ssion claim against defendants Bosco, Conley, and Sacco, arising out of plaintiff's access to writing instruments and the telephone;   (2) a First Amendment retaliation claim asserted against defendant Boyer with respect to plaintiff's ACW  admission, physical threats and assault; and (3) an Eighth Amendment excessive force claim asserted against defendant Boyer.  Signed by Magistrate Judge David E. Peebles on 2/2/18.  Objections to R&R due by 2/20/2018  Case Review Deadline 2/23/2018.  {r&r served via regular mail on plaintiff}(nas, )
